short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you earn cash back when you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Shopper Discounts and Rewards "SavingsKey™" is  free and can help you earn cash back for purchases at stores you know and trust. You pay exactly the same as you would normally shopping online but also receive an additional cash back. 

* Quick & Easy installation. Start Saving immediately!

* Shop online at hundreds of merchant sites or through Shopper Discounts and Rewards.

* Know immediately how much you will earn in Cash back from the merchant. Just "click", and you will earn on your purchase.

* Add this merchant to your favorite stores list. Select from a list of coupons offered by the current merchant.

View your "SavingsKey™" earnings balance. Click "options" to review your account history and settings. The SavingsKey™ webapp reminds you about store cash back earnings when you shop online. Then Shopper Discounts and Rewards mails your qualified rebate check monthly.

The "SavingsKey™" webapp is also available for other major browsers. Go to the following link in your desired browser: http://cashback.shopperdiscountsandrewards.com/client/

Read the Savings Key Assistant End User License agreement: 
http://offers.incentivenetworks.com/webapp/eula.html

Developed by Incentive Networks. Visit us at www.incentivenetworks.com
